SEARCH
Package edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model

Class Route

java.lang.Object
edu.umn.cs.csci3081w.project.model.Route
public class Route extends Object
Represents a route in the simulation. A Route consists of a series of stops and distances between them, along with a passenger generator to generate passengers at the stops.

      Route constructor.
      Parameters:
      id - identifier for route
      name - name of route
      stops - stops on this route
      distances - distances between subsequent stops of this route
      generator - Passenger generating object
